0.name: Entrace to hell
desc: "  It starts to get very hot.  Your feet start to burn, you scream.  You
are hopping around and looking around when you notice evrything is
either red or on fire.

1.name: Prison room
desc: "  Your feet stop burning as you step into a concrete room. As you walk
down the hall there are bars on either side of the room.  Behind the bars
are people screaming and trying to escape the burning room.

2.name: Prison room
desc: "  Your feet stop burning as you step into a concrete room. As you walk
down the hall there are bars on either side of the room.  Behind the bars
are people screaming and trying to escape the burning room.

3.name: Atheno's chamber
desc: "  The first thing you notice is a giant glowing hammer leaned against the
side of a fireplace.  The floor is a very soft carpet and there is a table
above you.

4.name: Title's cell
desc: "  You walk between some huge bars.  In the middle of the room is a giant
thing chained to the ground.  You start panicking and walking quietly hoping
not to be noticed.

5.name: Over cooled bar
desc: "  This room has bar stools going left to right down the room and tables
scattered all around.  The floor smells like booze and you are freezing
to death.

6.name: Flaming barracks
desc: "  You walk into a flaming house and look around.  You see armor and
weapons aligned across the room.  you think this is where the warriors
and soldiers stay.

7.name: Flaming barracks
desc: "  You walk into a flaming house and look around.  You see armor and
weapons aligned across the room.  you think this is where the warriors
and soldiers stay.

8.name: Lava pit
desc: "  There is a pit of lava at your feet.  You know that here only a creature
would be able to kill you.  Averting you step into the lava and scream,
for the pain isn't bearable.

9.name: Lava pit
desc: "  There is a pit of lava at your feet.  You know that here only a creature
would be able to kill you.  Averting you step into the lava and scream,
for the pain isn't bearable.

10.name: Sixth room
desc: "  You are standing in a cave with six exits, you don't know which one
to choose.  You start one way then stop and go the other way then stop,
this is mind wrecking.

11.name: Slave room
desc: "  This room is flaming with what looks like slaves all around chained
to each other mining for gold.  They don't notice you no matter what you do.

12.name: Slave room
desc: "  This room is flaming with what looks like slaves all around chained
to each other mining for gold.  They don't notice you no matter what you do.

13.name: Slave room
desc: "  This room is flaming with what looks like slaves all around chained
to each other mining for gold.  They don't notice you no matter what you do.

14.name: Slave room
desc: "  This room is flaming with what looks like slaves all around chained
to each other mining for gold.  They don't notice you no matter what you do.

15.name: Devil's chamber
desc: "  There is a golden chair fit for a king, accept for the fact that it's
on fire.  On top of the chair is a red being with large horns and flaming
eyes.
